sentences.en: Gretchen seemed to be moving in a private trance of her own.
sentences.cn: 格丽卿似乎迷失在自己的沉思里.

sentences.en: Having fallen into a trance state, they acted in accordance with these supernaturalist beliefs: dancing wildly for days on end.
sentences.cn: 人们陷入了恍惚状态，他们的行动与超自然主义者的信仰相一致：接连数日疯狂地跳舞。

sentences.en: He appeared as a man in a trance.
He said nothing but sat there as if in a trance.
sentences.cn: 他话也不说,坐在那里发愣.

sentences.en: He was put into a trance by a police hypnotist.
sentences.cn: 他在一位警方催眠师的引导下进入了催眠状态。

sentences.en: He'wakes'completely forgetful of what has taken place in the trance.
sentences.cn: 他 “ 醒来后 ” 完全忘记了在昏睡状态中发生的事情.

sentences.en: Her mother's voice in the corridor roused her from an angry trance.
sentences.cn: 她气得失魂落魄,是她妈妈在走廊里的声音唤醒了她.

sentences.en: Ho Hsiu - mei suddenly went in to a trance.
sentences.cn: 何秀妹的眼光忽然呆定了.

sentences.en: In a deep trance , the subject is taken back to an earlier stage of their life.
sentences.cn: 在极度恍惚中, 接受催眠的人回到早年的生活.

sentences.en: Like a man in a trance, Blake found his way back to his rooms.
sentences.cn: 布莱克神思恍惚地回到了自己的房间。

sentences.en: Patients under hypnosis pass into a trance - like state.
sentences.cn: 被催眠的病人逐渐进入昏睡状态.

sentences.en: She paid no attention to whatever others had said but sat there in a trance.
sentences.cn: 她全不理会大家的话,只是坐在那里发呆.

sentences.en: She said nothing but sat there as if in a trance.
sentences.cn: 她话也不说,坐在那里发呆.

sentences.en: She would go into a trance and wail her incantations to the spirits.
sentences.cn: 她会神志恍惚,哀声向幽灵念咒语.

sentences.en: The old man was in a trance, thinking of his past life.
sentences.cn: 这位老人回想着自己过去的生活,神情恍惚.

sentences.en: The stillness of her head and features was remarkable: she might have been in a trance, her eyes open, yet unseeing.
sentences.cn: 很明显，她的头和她的面目安详沉静：她似乎在那儿发怔出神，眼睛睁得大大的，但是却看不见。

sentences.en: They went into a trance to communicate with the spirit world.
sentences.cn: 他们进入出神状态与灵界交流。

trans.tran_cn: 出神，恍惚，[医]迷睡，神志昏迷，着迷，入迷
trans.tran_en: a state in which you behave as if you were asleep but are still able to hear and understand what is said to you
a state in which you behave as if you were asleep but are still able to hear and understand what is said to you
